document_data.caption: A lightning gen.
document_data.name: Lightning Gen
document_data.mainbody: '''Lightning gen''' were [[gen]] native to the [[Quasi-Elemental Plane of Lightning]].
document_data.Description: Lightning gen resembled tiny [[humanoid]]s made of pure white light. Their legs resembled lightning bolts.
document_data.Personality: These gen were usually very cautious and aloof.
document_data.Combat: Lightning gen preferred to avoid combat but were quite capable of attacking with shocking bolts. These gen were quite stout compared to other gen, perhaps as a reflection of the powerful masters they served.
document_data.Habitat/Society: Lightning gen served powerful entities as heralds or [[familiar]]s but they would not respond to [[sha'ir]]s the way other gen would.
